Card.Name: Cre_Aca_004
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground, take a non-unique spell at random from your graveyard and put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_008
Card.Description: When [THIS] dies, deal damage equal to its [ATK] to your hero.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_011
Card.Description: Whenever [THIS] attacks, pay [2:RESOURCES]. If you cannot, deal 2 damage to [THIS].

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_015
Card.Description: When [THIS] kills a creature during your turn, take a non-unique spell card in your graveyard and put it in your hand.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_016
Card.Description: When opponent plays a spell card or use an ability targeting a single creature, it must target [THIS] if possible.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_017
Card.Description: [THIS] cannot attack a hero.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_019
Card.Description: Spells in your hand cost [1:RESOURCES] less for every spell of the same school enchanting [THIS].

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_021
Card.Description: When [THIS] deals combat damage to the enemy Hero, put the top 3 cards of your opponent's library into their graveyard.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_022
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters play, take target enemy Ongoing spell on the battleground and play it for free.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_023
Card.Description: When [THIS] kills a creature, put the top 5 cards of your opponent's library into their graveyard.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_025
Card.Description: At the end of your turn, if you have 0 [RESOURCES], deal 1 damage to your hero.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_026
Card.Description: While [THIS] has no damage, it cannot attack.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_028
Card.Description: Taweret Warrior deals 3 more attack damage when attacking a melee creature.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_029
Card.Description: When [THIS] come into play, raise your [MAGIC] level by 2.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_030
Card.Description: The first time a card goes into enemy graveyard from their library during a turn, draw a card.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_031
Card.Description: When [THIS] comes into the battleground or leaves the battleground, puts the top 3 card of opponent's library into their graveyard.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_032
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground or attacks, put a crippling counter on another target enemy creature.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_033
Card.Description: For every spell in your graveyard, [THIS] gains Ward from that spell school.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_035
Card.Description: The first time THIS kills a creature durig your turn, THIS gain an additional attack.

Card.Name: Cre_Aca_036
Card.Description: When you play an Instant spell, draw a card.

Card.Name: Cre_Hav_051
Card.Description: While Crusader Watchman have no damage, it gains +[2:ATK] and +[1:RET].

Card.Name: Cre_Hav_053
Card.Description: When [THIS] attacks a melee creature, deal 2 damage to all other enemy melee creatures.

Card.Name: Cre_Hav_054
Card.Description: Cards in graveyard can't be targetted. While Crusader Chaplain has no damage, it gains Dark Ward.

Card.Name: Cre_Hav_055
Card.Description: When Anael, Angel of Redemption enters the battleground or attacks, heal all damage and remove all counter from another target friendly creature.

Card.Name: Cre_Inf_051
Card.Description: [THIS] cannot attack unless it has an adjacent friendly creature.

Card.Name: Cre_Inf_052
Card.Description: At the end of your turn, if [THIS] did not attack, deal 2 damage to your hero.

Card.Name: Cre_Inf_053
Card.Description: When a spell has a single target, it must target [THIS] if it can.

Card.Name: Cre_Inf_054
Card.Description: You cannot produce more than [3:RESOURCES] during your supply phase.

Card.Name: Cre_Inf_055
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground or attacks, another friendly target creature gains +[1:ATK] until end of turn.

Card.Name: Cre_Nec_051
Card.Description: When [THIS] dies during your opponent's turn, put 1 Poison counter on all creatures in the same row.

Card.Name: Cre_Nec_052
Card.Description: At the begining of your turn, put a poison counter on [THIS]. Its [ATK] is equal to the number of poison counter on it.

Card.Name: Cre_Nec_053
Card.Description: At the beginning of your supply phase, if [THIS] is in your graveyard and you have 5 cards or less in your graveyard, return [THIS] to your hand.

Card.Name: Cre_Nec_054
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground, put a Poison counter on it. If [THIS] dies during your supply phase, put a Poison counter on every enemy creature.

Card.Name: Cre_Nec_055
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground or attacks, another target friendly creature gains Infect 1 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Cre_San_050
Card.Description: When [THIS] attacks, draw a card.

Card.Name: Cre_San_051
Card.Description: Ambush: Deals 2 damage to ambushed creature. (Ambush abilities trigger when an enemy creature enters the battleground in the same row.)

Card.Name: Cre_San_052
Card.Description: If you have equal or less creatures on the battleground than your opponent, [THIS] gets +[1:ATK] and +[2:RET].

Card.Name: Cre_San_053
Card.Description: When another friendly Sanctuary creature is returned to your hand, that creature costs [2:RESOURCES] less to play until end of turn.

Card.Name: Cre_San_054
Card.Description: Ambush: Deals 2 damage to ambushed creature. (Ambush abilities trigger when an enemy creature enters the battleground in the same row.)

Card.Name: Cre_San_055
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground or attacks, target enemy creature cannot attack until your next turn.

Card.Name: Cre_Str_050
Card.Description: If there are no other friendly creatures in play, destroy [THIS].

Card.Name: Cre_Str_051
Card.Description: Ambush: Deals 1 damage to ambushed creature. (Ambush abilities trigger when an enemy creature enters the battleground in the same row.)

Card.Name: Cre_Str_053
Card.Description: At the beginning of your turn, return [THIS] to your hand.

Card.Name: Cre_Str_054
Card.Description: Ambush: Deals 3 damage to ambushed creature. (Ambush abilities trigger when an enemy creature enters the battleground in the same row.)

Card.Name: Cre_Str_055
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground or attacks, another target friendly creature gains Swift until end of turn.

Card.Name: Cre_Neu_052
Card.Description: When [THIS] enters the battleground, search your library for a unique fortune and put that fortune into your hand.

Card.Name: Cre_Neu_055
Card.Description: To play [THIS], you must banish 3 cards from your graveyard. When [THIS] dies, return it to your hand.

Card.Name: Cre_Neu_056
Card.Description: [This] can attack enemy hero even if there is creatures in front of it.
